key_components.name: OpenAICompatClient
key_components.summary:
Minimal OpenAI-compatible chat client returning JSON content. Attributes:
    base_url: Endpoint to send requests to.

key_components.name: LLMBackend
key_components.summary:
Configuration for a local or remote LLM endpoint. Attributes:
    kind: Backend type, e.g.

key_components.name: LLMService
key_components.summary:
Manage the lifecycle of a local LLM server. Attributes:
    backend: Connection information for the target service.
